Verses: 1 parimalathailaththaippaarkkilum Narkeerththiyum, Oruvanudaiya Janananaalaippaarkkilum Marananaalum Nalladhu.
2 virundhuveettukkup Povadhilum Dhukkaveettukkup Povadhu Nalam; Idhile Ellaa Manusharin Mudivum Kaanappadum; Uyirodirukkiravan Idhaith Than Manadhile Sindhippaan.
3 nagaippaip Paarkkilum Dhukkippu Nalam; Mugadhukkaththinaale Irudhayam Seerppadum.
4 gnaanigalin Irudhayam Dhukkaveettile Irukkum; Moodarin Irudhayam Kalippuveettile Irukkum.
5 oruvan Moodarin Paattaikketpadhilum, Gnaaniyin Kadindhukolludhalaik Ketpadhu Nalam.
6 moodanin Nagaippu Paanaiyinkeezh Erigira Mullugalin Padapadappaippolirukkum; Idhuvum Maayaiye.
7 idukkanaanadhu Gnaaniyaiyum Paiththiyakkaaranaakkum; Paridhaanam Irudhayaththaik Kedukkum.
8 oru Kaariyaththin Thuvakkaththaippaarkkilum Adhin Mudivu Nalladhu; Perumaiyullavanaippaarkkilum Porumaiyullavan Uththaman.
9 un Manadhil Seekkiramaaik Kobankollaadhe; Moodarin Nenjile Kobam Kudikollum.
10 innaatkalaip Paarkkilum Munnaatkal Nalamaayirundhadhu Endru Sollaadhe; Nee Idhaikkuriththuk Ketpadhu Gnaanamalla.
11 sudhandharaththode Gnaanam Nalladhu; Sooriyanaik Kaangiravargalukku Idhinaale Prayojanamundu.
12 gnaanam Kedagam, Thiraviyamum Kedagam; Gnaanam Thannai Udaiyavargalukku Jeevanaith Tharum; Idhuve Arivin Menmai.
13 dhevanudaiya Seyalaik Gavaniththuppaar; Avar Konalaakkinadhai Nermaiyaakkaththakkavan Yaar?

14 vaazhvukaalaththil Nanmaiyai Anubaviththiru, Thaazhvukaalaththil Sindhanaisey; Manushan Thanakkuppin Varuvadhondraiyum Kandupidiyaadhapadikku Dhevan Ivvirandaiyum Ondrukkondru Edhiridaiyaaga Vaiththirukkiraar.
15 ivai Ellaavatraiyum En Maayaiyin Naatkalil Kanden; Than Needhiyile Kettuppogira Needhimaanumundu, Than Paavaththile Neediththirukkira Paaviyumundu.
16 minjina Needhimaanaayiraadhe, Unnai Adhiga Gnaaniyumaakkaadhe; Unnai Nee En Keduththukkollavendum?
17 minjina Dhushtanaayiraadhe, Adhiga Pedhaiyumaayiraadhe; Un Kaalaththukkumunne Nee En Saagavendum?
18 nee Idhaip Patrikkolvadhum Adhaik Kaividaadhiruppadhum Nalam; Dhevanukku Bayappadugiravan Ivaigalellaavatrinindrum Kaakkappaduvaan.
19 nagaraththilulla Paththu Adhipadhigalaippaarkkilum, Gnaanam Gnaaniyai Adhiga Belavaanaakkum.
20 oru Paavamum Seyyaamal, Nanmaiyaiye Seyyaththakka Needhimaan Boomiyilillai.
21 sollappadum Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Gavaniyaadhe; Gavaniththaal Un Velaikkaaran Unnai Nindhippadhaik Kelvippadavendiyadhaagum.
22 anegandharam Neeyum Pirarai Nindhiththaayendru, Un Manadhukku Theriyume.
23 ivai Ellaavatraiyum Gnaanaththinaal Sodhiththuppaarththen. Naan Gnaanavaanaaven Endren, Adhu Enakku Dhooramaayitru.
24 dhooramum Magaa Aazhamumaayirukkiradhaik Kandadaigiravan Yaar?
25 gnaanaththaiyum Kaaranakaariyaththaiyum Visaariththu Aaraaindhu Ariyavum, Madhikettin Aagaamiyaththaiyum Buththimayakkaththin Paiththiyaththaiyum Ariyavum En Manadhai Seluththinen.

26 kannigalum Valaigalumaagiya Nenjamum, Kayirugalumaagiya Kaigaludaiya Sthreeyaanaval, Saavilum Adhiga Kasappullavalendru Kanden, Dhevanukkumunbaaga Sargunanaayirukkiravan Avalukkuth Thappuvaan; Paaviyo Avalaal Pidipaduvaan.
27 kaariyaththai Ariyumpadi Ovvondraai Visaaranaipanni, Idho, Idhaik Kandupidiththen Endru Prasangi Sollugiraan.
28 en Manam Innum Ondraith Thedugiradhu, Adhai Naan Kandupidikkavillai; Aayiramperukkulle Oru Purushanaik Kanden, Ivargalellaarukkullum Oru Sthreeyai Naan Kaanavillai.
29 idho Dhevan Manushanai Semmaiyaanavanaai Undaakkinaar; Avargalo Anega Ubaayathandhirangalaith Thedikkondaargal; Idhaimaaththiram Kanden.
